name: Why the Frog cross the Road
name_original: Why the Frog cross the Road
description:
Help the frog to reach the other side within a limited time.

Move and rotate the tiles to create the path the frog will travel while avoiding the dangers of the forest and the roads.

And if you feel capable, eat all the flys across your path and make the frog happier.

-------How to Play-------

 With left click you can swap the position of two tiles to move them and with right click you can rotate them.

There are diferent tipes of tiles:

- Forest decoration      -     Can be rotated and moved

-Grass road      -     Can be rotated and moved

-Dirt road      -     Can be only rotated

-Water      -     Can't be rotated or moved

-Street      -     Can't be rotated or moved

If there is any bug o problem with the game pls let me know and try the Windows version, in case it only happens on the web version.

Some of the most critical bugs have been fixed including:

-Time never goes down.

-frog can get stuck and never die

-overlapping tiles in some levels

The web will always be the most updated, with a windows build to download. The original jam version will be available as HTML and windows downloads
